content:
That sounds like a great combo! A sundress is perfect for a casual barbecue, and adding some nice sandals will definitely elevate your outfit. It's awesome that your sister helped you pick out the sandals - sisterly advice is always valuable, right?

**Sundress Styling Tips:**

* Since you mentioned you like to add flair with accessories, consider adding a statement necklace or a fun pair of earrings to complement your sundress.
* A wide-brimmed hat or a floppy sun hat can add a cute touch to your outfit, plus provide some extra sun protection.
* If you want to dress up your look, throw on a denim jacket or a lightweight cardigan to add some texture and depth.
* Don't forget to add a cute pair of sunglasses to complete your look!

**Barbecue Essentials:**

* Don't forget to bring a comfortable pair of flip flops or sneakers to change into if your sandals get uncomfortable.
* Pack a small cross-body bag or a clutch with essentials like sunscreen, a phone charger, and some cash.
* Bring a refillable water bottle to stay hydrated throughout the day.
* If you're planning to stay for a while, consider bringing a light blanket or a portable chair to make your experience more comfortable.

I hope you have an amazing time at the barbecue, and I'm sure you'll look fabulous in your new sundress and sandals!
